backend/main.mo: Main backend actor that traps on startPollRequest, indicating polling should not be called on this actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting removal of mock data from frontend pages (Dashboard, PropertyDetails, Search) and hooks, plus addition of empty state components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing their purpose, styling, and data handling approaches after mock data removal.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes, including sidebar, chart, and UI component color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application from /src/main.tsx into a root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, search, dashboard, property details, transfer, and register pages, wrapped in ThemeProvider with Toaster.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable empty state component displaying an icon, title, description, and optional action button with hover animations.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Application footer with three-column layout containing app description, quick links, social icons, copyright notice, and Caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive navigation header with logo, nav links, theme toggle, Internet Identity authentication dropdown, and mobile sheet menu with smooth transitions.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapper component that renders Header, main content area with Outlet for nested routes, and Footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages backend actor instances based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for land registry operations (get/search records, register parcels, manage transfers) with optimistic updates, real-time refetching, and error handling via toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark mode theming using OKLCH color space, plus shimmer animation utilities for loading states.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Authenticated dashboard displaying user's land records, pending transfers, and profile statistics with loading skeletons, real-time sync indicators, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Marketing landing page showcasing the blockchain land registry system with hero section, feature cards highlighting security/verification capabilities, and call-to-action buttons.
frontend/src/pages/PropertyDetailsPage.t: Displays detailed information about a specific land parcel including ownership history, documents, and blockchain verification status. Fetches property data by parcelId from route params and shows loading/error states with skeleton UI.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Provides a form for authenticated users to register new land parcels on the blockchain with fields for parcel ID, coordinates, area, land use, and description. Shows success confirmation after registration and requires Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Implements a search interface for querying land records by parcel ID, location, or owner with real-time results displayed as cards. Shows loading skeletons during search and empty state when no query is entered.
frontend/src/pages/TransferPage.tsx: Handles property ownership transfer by accepting a buyer's principal ID for a specific parcel. Requires Internet Identity authentication and displays success confirmation with transfer details after completion.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended border radius values, custom shadows, and container settings. Includes plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking a government-grade blockchain land registry system built on Internet Computer Protocol with multi-canister architecture (LandRegistry, Identity, Payment, DocumentVerification). Contains architectural notes, existing features for React Query hooks, UI refinements, real-time synchronization, and design system updates across frontend components.
